00043 int bmesh_vert_in_edge(BMEdge *e, BMVert *v)
00044 {
00045     if (e->v1 == v || e->v2 == v) return TRUE;
00046     return FALSE;
00047 }
00048 int bmesh_verts_in_edge(BMVert *v1, BMVert *v2, BMEdge *e)
00049 {
00050     if (e->v1 == v1 && e->v2 == v2) return TRUE;
00051     else if (e->v1 == v2 && e->v2 == v1) return TRUE;
00052     return FALSE;
00053 }
00054 
00055 BMVert *bmesh_edge_other_vert_get(BMEdge *e, BMVert *v)
00056 {
00057     if (e->v1 == v) {
00058         return e->v2;
00059     }
00060     else if (e->v2 == v) {
00061         return e->v1;
00062     }
00063     return NULL;
00064 }
00065 
00066 int bmesh_edge_swapverts(BMEdge *e, BMVert *orig, BMVert *newv)
00067 {
00068     if (e->v1 == orig) {
00069         e->v1 = newv;
00070         e->v1_disk_link.next = e->v1_disk_link.prev = NULL;
00071         return TRUE;
00072     }
00073     else if (e->v2 == orig) {
00074         e->v2 = newv;
00075         e->v2_disk_link.next = e->v2_disk_link.prev = NULL;
00076         return TRUE;
00077     }
00078     return FALSE;
00079 }

00156 int bmesh_disk_edge_append(BMEdge *e, BMVert *v)
00157 {
00158     if (!v->e) {
00159         BMDiskLink *dl1 = BM_DISK_EDGE_LINK_GET(e, v);
00160 
00161         v->e = e;
00162         dl1->next = dl1->prev = e;
00163     }
00164     else {
00165         BMDiskLink *dl1, *dl2, *dl3;
00166 
00167         dl1 = BM_DISK_EDGE_LINK_GET(e, v);
00168         dl2 = BM_DISK_EDGE_LINK_GET(v->e, v);
00169         dl3 = dl2->prev ? BM_DISK_EDGE_LINK_GET(dl2->prev, v) : NULL;
00170 
00171         dl1->next = v->e;
00172         dl1->prev = dl2->prev;
00173 
00174         dl2->prev = e;
00175         if (dl3)
00176             dl3->next = e;
00177     }
00178 
00179     return TRUE;
00180 }
00181 
00182 void bmesh_disk_edge_remove(BMEdge *e, BMVert *v)
00183 {
00184     BMDiskLink *dl1, *dl2;
00185 
00186     dl1 = BM_DISK_EDGE_LINK_GET(e, v);
00187     if (dl1->prev) {
00188         dl2 = BM_DISK_EDGE_LINK_GET(dl1->prev, v);
00189         dl2->next = dl1->next;
00190     }
00191 
00192     if (dl1->next) {
00193         dl2 = BM_DISK_EDGE_LINK_GET(dl1->next, v);
00194         dl2->prev = dl1->prev;
00195     }
00196 
00197     if (v->e == e)
00198         v->e = (e != dl1->next) ? dl1->next : NULL;
00199 
00200     dl1->next = dl1->prev = NULL;
00201 }

00210 BMEdge *bmesh_disk_edge_next(BMEdge *e, BMVert *v)
00211 {
00212     if (v == e->v1)
00213         return e->v1_disk_link.next;
00214     if (v == e->v2)
00215         return e->v2_disk_link.next;
00216     return NULL;
00217 }
00218 
00219 BMEdge *bmesh_disk_edge_prev(BMEdge *e, BMVert *v)
00220 {
00221     if (v == e->v1)
00222         return e->v1_disk_link.prev;
00223     if (v == e->v2)
00224         return e->v2_disk_link.prev;
00225     return NULL;
00226 }

00228 BMEdge *bmesh_disk_edge_exists(BMVert *v1, BMVert *v2)
00229 {
00230     BMEdge *e_iter, *e_first;
00231     
00232     if (v1->e) {
00233         e_first = e_iter = v1->e;
00234 
00235         do {
00236             if (bmesh_verts_in_edge(v1, v2, e_iter)) {
00237                 return e_iter;
00238             }
00239         } while ((e_iter = bmesh_disk_edge_next(e_iter, v1)) != e_first);
00240     }
00241     
00242     return NULL;
00243 }
00244 
00245 int bmesh_disk_count(BMVert *v)
00246 {
00247     if (v->e) {
00248         BMEdge *e_first, *e_iter;
00249         int count = 0;
00250 
00251         e_iter = e_first = v->e;
00252 
00253         do {
00254             if (!e_iter) {
00255                 return 0;
00256             }
00257 
00258             if (count >= (1 << 20)) {
00259                 printf("bmesh error: infinite loop in disk cycle!\n");
00260                 return 0;
00261             }
00262             count++;
00263         } while ((e_iter = bmesh_disk_edge_next(e_iter, v)) != e_first);
00264         return count;
00265     }
00266     else {
00267         return 0;
00268     }
00269 }
00270 
00271 int bmesh_disk_validate(int len, BMEdge *e, BMVert *v)
00272 {
00273     BMEdge *e_iter;
00274 
00275     if (!BM_vert_in_edge(e, v))
00276         return FALSE;
00277     if (bmesh_disk_count(v) != len || len == 0)
00278         return FALSE;
00279 
00280     e_iter = e;
00281     do {
00282         if (len != 1 && bmesh_disk_edge_prev(e_iter, v) == e_iter) {
00283             return FALSE;
00284         }
00285     } while ((e_iter = bmesh_disk_edge_next(e_iter, v)) != e);
00286 
00287     return TRUE;
00288 }
00289 
00298 int bmesh_disk_facevert_count(BMVert *v)
00299 {
00300     /* is there an edge on this vert at all */
00301     if (v->e) {
00302         BMEdge *e_first, *e_iter;
00303         int count = 0;
00304 
00305         /* first, loop around edge */
00306         e_first = e_iter = v->e;
00307         do {
00308             if (e_iter->l) {
00309                 count += bmesh_radial_facevert_count(e_iter->l, v);
00310             }
00311         } while ((e_iter = bmesh_disk_edge_next(e_iter, v)) != e_first);
00312         return count;
00313     }
00314     else {
00315         return 0;
00316     }
00317 }

00327 BMEdge *bmesh_disk_faceedge_find_first(BMEdge *e, BMVert *v)
00328 {
00329     BMEdge *searchedge = NULL;
00330     searchedge = e;
00331     do {
00332         if (searchedge->l && bmesh_radial_facevert_count(searchedge->l, v)) {
00333             return searchedge;
00334         }
00335     } while ((searchedge = bmesh_disk_edge_next(searchedge, v)) != e);
00336 
00337     return NULL;
00338 }
00339 
00340 BMEdge *bmesh_disk_faceedge_find_next(BMEdge *e, BMVert *v)
00341 {
00342     BMEdge *searchedge = NULL;
00343     searchedge = bmesh_disk_edge_next(e, v);
00344     do {
00345         if (searchedge->l && bmesh_radial_facevert_count(searchedge->l, v)) {
00346             return searchedge;
00347         }
00348     } while ((searchedge = bmesh_disk_edge_next(searchedge, v)) != e);
00349     return e;
00350 }

00352 /*****radial cycle functions, e.g. loops surrounding edges**** */
00353 int bmesh_radial_validate(int radlen, BMLoop *l)
00354 {
00355     BMLoop *l_iter = l;
00356     int i = 0;
00357     
00358     if (bmesh_radial_length(l) != radlen)
00359         return FALSE;
00360 
00361     do {
00362         if (UNLIKELY(!l_iter)) {
00363             BMESH_ASSERT(0);
00364             return FALSE;
00365         }
00366         
00367         if (l_iter->e != l->e)
00368             return FALSE;
00369         if (l_iter->v != l->e->v1 && l_iter->v != l->e->v2)
00370             return FALSE;
00371         
00372         if (UNLIKELY(i > BM_LOOP_RADIAL_MAX)) {
00373             BMESH_ASSERT(0);
00374             return FALSE;
00375         }
00376         
00377         i++;
00378     } while ((l_iter = l_iter->radial_next) != l);
00379 
00380     return TRUE;
00381 }
00382 
00391 void bmesh_radial_loop_remove(BMLoop *l, BMEdge *e)
00392 {
00393     /* if e is non-NULL, l must be in the radial cycle of e */
00394     if (UNLIKELY(e && e != l->e)) {
00395         BMESH_ASSERT(0);
00396     }
00397 
00398     if (l->radial_next != l) {
00399         if (e && l == e->l)
00400             e->l = l->radial_next;
00401 
00402         l->radial_next->radial_prev = l->radial_prev;
00403         l->radial_prev->radial_next = l->radial_next;
00404     }
00405     else {
00406         if (e) {
00407             if (l == e->l) {
00408                 e->l = NULL;
00409             }
00410             else {
00411                 BMESH_ASSERT(0);
00412             }
00413         }
00414     }
00415 
00416     /* l is no longer in a radial cycle; empty the links
00417      * to the cycle and the link back to an edge */
00418     l->radial_next = l->radial_prev = NULL;
00419     l->e = NULL;
00420 }

00429 BMLoop *bmesh_radial_faceloop_find_first(BMLoop *l, BMVert *v)
00430 {
00431     BMLoop *l_iter;
00432     l_iter = l;
00433     do {
00434         if (l_iter->v == v) {
00435             return l_iter;
00436         }
00437     } while ((l_iter = l_iter->radial_next) != l);
00438     return NULL;
00439 }
00440 
00441 BMLoop *bmesh_radial_faceloop_find_next(BMLoop *l, BMVert *v)
00442 {
00443     BMLoop *l_iter;
00444     l_iter = l->radial_next;
00445     do {
00446         if (l_iter->v == v) {
00447             return l_iter;
00448         }
00449     } while ((l_iter = l_iter->radial_next) != l);
00450     return l;
00451 }
00452 
00453 int bmesh_radial_length(BMLoop *l)
00454 {
00455     BMLoop *l_iter = l;
00456     int i = 0;
00457 
00458     if (!l)
00459         return 0;
00460 
00461     do {
00462         if (UNLIKELY(!l_iter)) {
00463             /* radial cycle is broken (not a circulat loop) */
00464             BMESH_ASSERT(0);
00465             return 0;
00466         }
00467         
00468         i++;
00469         if (UNLIKELY(i >= BM_LOOP_RADIAL_MAX)) {
00470             BMESH_ASSERT(0);
00471             return -1;
00472         }
00473     } while ((l_iter = l_iter->radial_next) != l);
00474 
00475     return i;
00476 }
00477 
00478 void bmesh_radial_append(BMEdge *e, BMLoop *l)
00479 {
00480     if (e->l == NULL) {
00481         e->l = l;
00482         l->radial_next = l->radial_prev = l;
00483     }
00484     else {
00485         l->radial_prev = e->l;
00486         l->radial_next = e->l->radial_next;
00487 
00488         e->l->radial_next->radial_prev = l;
00489         e->l->radial_next = l;
00490 
00491         e->l = l;
00492     }
00493 
00494     if (UNLIKELY(l->e && l->e != e)) {
00495         /* l is already in a radial cycle for a different edge */
00496         BMESH_ASSERT(0);
00497     }
00498     
00499     l->e = e;
00500 }
00501 
00502 int bmesh_radial_face_find(BMEdge *e, BMFace *f)
00503 {
00504     BMLoop *l_iter;
00505     int i, len;
00506 
00507     len = bmesh_radial_length(e->l);
00508     for (i = 0, l_iter = e->l; i < len; i++, l_iter = l_iter->radial_next) {
00509         if (l_iter->f == f)
00510             return TRUE;
00511     }
00512     return FALSE;
00513 }

00521 int bmesh_radial_facevert_count(BMLoop *l, BMVert *v)
00522 {
00523     BMLoop *l_iter;
00524     int count = 0;
00525     l_iter = l;
00526     do {
00527         if (l_iter->v == v) {
00528             count++;
00529         }
00530     } while ((l_iter = l_iter->radial_next) != l);
00531 
00532     return count;
00533 }
00534 
00535 /*****loop cycle functions, e.g. loops surrounding a face**** */
00536 int bmesh_loop_validate(BMFace *f)
00537 {
00538     int i;
00539     int len = f->len;
00540     BMLoop *l_iter, *l_first;
00541 
00542     l_first = BM_FACE_FIRST_LOOP(f);
00543 
00544     if (l_first == NULL) {
00545         return FALSE;
00546     }
00547 
00548     /* Validate that the face loop cycle is the length specified by f->len */
00549     for (i = 1, l_iter = l_first->next; i < len; i++, l_iter = l_iter->next) {
00550         if ((l_iter->f != f) ||
00551             (l_iter == l_first))
00552         {
00553             return FALSE;
00554         }
00555     }
00556     if (l_iter != l_first) {
00557         return FALSE;
00558     }
00559 
00560     /* Validate the loop->prev links also form a cycle of length f->len */
00561     for (i = 1, l_iter = l_first->prev; i < len; i++, l_iter = l_iter->prev) {
00562         if (l_iter == l_first) {
00563             return FALSE;
00564         }
00565     }
00566     if (l_iter != l_first) {
00567         return FALSE;
00568     }
00569 
00570     return TRUE;
00571 }
